titlestmt.titleproper: Gerard Designs Collection of Mold Drawings
titlestmt.subtitle: A description of the collection at Syracuse University
titlestmt.author: DGI/MM

list.item: Aug 2014 - drawings itemized, rehoused, and processed for offsite storage; index added (DRF)

did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.unittitle: Gerard Designs Collection of Mold Drawings
did.abstract: Collection consists of drawings of molds created by Gerard Designs for various companies in the plastics and other industries. Most drawings contain initials of Robert McGee.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents of the Collection
scopecontent.p: The Gerard Designs Collection of Mold Drawings consists of drawings of molds created by Gerard Designs for various companies in the plastics and other industries, including Parker Brothers, Monsanto, and General Electric. Most drawings contain initials of Robert McGee. See Index to Companies at the end of this finding aid for a complete alphabetical list.
Drawings are in relatively good condition; however, many are faded where exposed to light and acidic materials for long periods of time.

arrangement.head: Arrangement of the Collection
arrangement.p: Arranged by drawing number, which is also roughly chronological.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: &scrc_name; has numerous holdings in the areas of plastics and industrial design. Please refer to &subjindex; for a complete listing.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: The majority of our archival and manuscript collections are housed offsite and require advanced notice for retrieval. Researchers are encouraged to contact us in advance concerning the collection material they wish to access for their research.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Written permission must be obtained from SCRC and all relevant rights holders before publishing quotations, excerpts or images from any materials in this collection.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Preferred citation for this material is as follows:

Gerard Designs Collection of Mold Drawings,
&su_name;

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Transfer from National Plastics Center and Museum, 11/06/2008.
